chapter.title: MDS Trigger Admin Commands
chapter.para: The Trigger Service has three command-line clients for administrators.
The command in the Aggregator Framework is used to configure the Trigger Registration Service to collect information from various sources.
The configuration file (located at $GLOBUS_LOCATION/etc/globus_wsrf_mds_trigger/client-config-settings) configures the clients. You must edit this file prior to using the clients.
